about_the_game:
3 Levels & 3 Gamemodes included in demo

Follow dynamic rules and use special weapons to defeat enemies for each level and gamemode.

Key Features

-Engage in battle with strange enemies and bosses.

- Unlock gamemodes

- Gain access to new weapons after each boss fight
detailed_description:
3 Levels & 3 Gamemodes included in demo

Follow dynamic rules and use special weapons to defeat enemies for each level and gamemode.

Key Features

-Engage in battle with strange enemies and bosses.

- Unlock gamemodes

- Gain access to new weapons after each boss fight

fullgame.name: The Adventures of Emoji 4: Fly High Mouse Remastered

name: The Adventures of Emoji 4: Fly High Mouse Remastered Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel core i3 (2 GHz+) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: geforce gtx 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Step into The Adventures of Emoji 4 Remastered, where you immerse yourself in this mouse cartoon world playing a shoot em up side-scroller. Follow dynamic rules and use special weapons to defeat enemies for each level. Stay focused on the prize or you might find your game completely cut off.
